amountAuthorized.description: Amount authorized by the payment gateway.

stateAsString.description: Payment group state in string after authorization.

id.description: The id of the payment group item.

authorizationStatus.description: Object having details about the status of authorization

transactionUuid.description: Unique Transaction id sent by storefront to CyberSource to correlate the response data with order once the response arrives

displayMessage.description: User friendly message in case authorization fails.

transactionSuccess.description: Whether transaction was successful or failed.

reasonCode.description: Authorization outcome reason code specific to CyberSource
